title: poro rider sejuani skin
body: Does anyone know whether or not Riot will re-release poro rider sejuani skin to the store, and if so when.

replies.body: Poro Rider Sejuani is a legacy skin, which means it may return to the store. She'd most likely return during the Snowdown. :]
Remember though you can still get it via Mystery Gift!
Yup, gotta wait till  Christmas time.
